title: Trick or Treat Lulu skin concept

embed.description: After long last i have finally finished this! Halloween is coming up so i thought why not make a halloween themed skin for lulu

body:
This was such a fun skin to make! i learnt a lot from it too :) Who should i do next?
For more art here is my fb page: https://www.facebook.com/Hamzilla15/?ref=page_homepage_panel

replies.body:
Oh so cute! And the little bat Pix is an adorable idea ^^ Love your particle concepts as well~
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
Please make this a skin!!!
thank you :3

{{champion:45}} http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/012/367/evilest.gif

{{champion:117}} "Does this mean you're my b-"

{{champion:45}} http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/727/910/577.gif
That's pretty cool, though when I see the progression image, to me, some of the earlier ones look more like Lulu than the final.
I was about to say the same. The early ones looked better to me and just plain looked like Lulu more.
As a Lulu main... I APPROVE!
And we got the shitty ones Riot came up with. xD.  This is way better than those skins.
lulu main here! yes please!
I need it.
Seriously Riot where's your halloween spirit..When the community made better halloween skins than you..{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I really want Bewitching Lulu but she already has Wicked :(
so ? lux has elementist and star guardian So heck why not xD
Omg as a lulu main this would be amazing Tristana has a bewhitchng skin lulu needs one tooo

I'm a simple man: I see Lulu, I upvote.

P.s.
_Especially_ when the votes are at 48.

https://img00.deviantart.net/2f4e/i/2016/038/f/7/jhin_meme_by_mikouchan-d9qyb6a.png
:D
That is amazing!
Love it! clearly  lot of effort was put into this, good job <3
This is not the halloween skin the community deserves, but the one it needs.
Or Bittersweet Lulu Chroma
Really wish we got Halloween skins like this every year.

So... bewitching Trist except Lulu?
~~uncreative~~ TAKE MY UPVOTE BBE
Is cute , and fits her very well.
Pijama party sivir! :D
Beautifully done! I totally support this skin idea.
Wow... that lighting. Looks incredible {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

I would auto buy this in a heartbeat!

now THIS is a halloween skin {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
This is really great! Love the splash art and I **really** love the little Bat-Pix with the trick-or-treat pumpkin!
That little pumpkin is adorable.
Cute and evil but mostly cute.
